resources.string: Are you using your phone too much? HeadApp it\'s here to help! HeadApp will notify you at the right moment to get back to the things that really matter.
You don\'t have to do anything, HeadApp will handle everything for you.

string-array.name: mensajes_pantalla
string-array.item: Hey, put your head up!
No more distractions!
Take a break put the phone away.
Just block the phone!
Hey Dick get to work!
Get off the phone.
Just put the phone down slowly.
Get your sh**t together!
Distracted people tend to fall.
Less anxiety if your block the phone.
YOU! Yes YOU get off the phone!!
Get to work
You could’ve been fu***ng
With all this wasted time you could’ve….
Stay away from the phone and run.
Stop just throw away the phone.
Life happens while you’re at your phone.
Don’t lose touch with reality.
Get off line NOW.
You are so needy for Wi-Fi.
I’m just a phone not your life.
You are checking me out way too much.
Turn off the phone it’s for the better.
Don’t get distracted from the important.
Watch where you’re walking DUMB ASS

string-array.name: mensajes_pantalla2
string-array.item: Half an hour!
Go for a run fatty!!!
Your meal is going to burn.
Keep Calm and Get Yo Ass Up!
Life is better when you’re off your phone
You’ve just lost a billion brain cells
How’s the weather?
Stop being antisocial.
Read a book they have unlimited battery.
30 minutes a day equals a week in a year.
Get up you lazy you.
Take your filthy paws off of me
Your time is limited don’t wasted it.
Real life happens outside my screen.
Don’t get isolated.
Turn off the Wi-FI.
30 minutes lost!
Be social but in the real world.
There must be something better than this.
Get off your ass and work for your goals!
Anxious for Wi-Fi…JUNKY
Do you need more Wi-Fi that O2?
JUNKY JUNKY JUNKY!
Too much porn is bad… just saying.

string-array.name: mensajes_pantalla3
string-array.item: ADDICT ADDICT ADDICT!
Your\'ve been using this for 45 minutes.
Your days go by in front of a screen :(
You seem to be an addict.
Go get a job.
Get A Life Loser!
Watching at a screen will not get you far.
Get off the hook for real.
You’re living in a cage!
Get free from the phone!
¿Don’t you see in what you’re becoming?
I’m bad for you relationships.
For real stop with the porn.
I’m becoming in your life.
Go out make some friends.
Escaping reality?

string-array.name: mensajes_pantalla4
string-array.item: IDGAF. I literally DGAF.
You could be getting some head right now
Saddle up cowboy!
You need an intervention.

string-array.name: mensajes_pantalla5
string-array.item: Too much social networks could damage your self steem.
Between your goals and you there is your smartphone.
Go back to be human again get off line.
There is a whole world outside to enjoy.
Get free from anxiety live in off line mode.
Smile if you have your battery low.
Save momentes not pictures.
Capture moments not videos.
Don\'t share your problems fix them.
By using too much your phone you could damage your spine.
Less phone equals less anxiety.
You now have the concentration span of a gold fish.
Days go by in front of a screen.
Be creative not a slave of your phone.
Don\'t live in the digital world.
Get real communication, speak!
Don\'t lose any moment because of your smartphone.
Be productive!
By using too much your phone you could damage your head.
Get out of the window real life has better resolution.
There\'s no need to be connected all the time.
